original_text: Abimelech attacked the city all that day. He took the city and he killed all the people who lived there. Then he destroyed the city. He put salt all over it as a curse.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그 날 종일토록 그 성을 쳐서 마침내는 점령하고 거기 있는 백성을 죽이며 그 성을 헐고 소금을 뿌리니라

sentences.original_text: Abimelech attacked the city all that day.
sentences.korean_translation: 아비멜렉이 그 날 종일 그 성을 공격했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he killed all the people who lived there.
He put salt all over it as a curse.
